Title: CASE OF IRINA SMIRNOVA v. UKRAINE

Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Effective investigation Positive obligations)
Violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8 - Positive obligations Non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage
